mapper.select: select member_number from tbl_member where member_number=0 and member_id=#{memberId} and member_password=#{memberPassword}
select member_number, member_id, member_name, member_status from tbl_member where member_number != 0 limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(member_number) from tbl_member where member_number != 0
select member_number, member_id, member_name, member_status from tbl_member where member_id like concat('%', #{memberId}, '%') and member_number != 0 limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(member_number) from tbl_member where member_id like concat('%', #{memberId}, '%') and member_number != 0
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone_number, member_email, member_ask, member_answer, member_address, member_address_detail, member_zone_code) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAsk}, #{memberAnswer}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddressDetail}, #{memberZoneCode})
mapper.select: select count(member_number) from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(member_number) from tbl_member where member_nickname = #{memberNickname}
select member_number from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_password = #{memberPassword}

select c.channel_name , c.channel_comment , cf.channel_file_system_name, m.member_number, m.member_password , m.member_nickname , m.member_phone_number , m.member_address , m.member_address_detail , m.member_zone_code from tbl_member m join tbl_channel c on m.member_number = #{memberNumber} and m.member_number = c.member_number left outer join tbl_channel_file cf on c.channel_number = cf.channel_number
mapper.update: update tbl_member m join tbl_channel c on m.member_number = c.member_number set c.channel_name = #{channelName}, c.channel_comment = #{channelComment}, m.member_password = #{memberPassword}, m.member_nickname = #{memberNickname}, m.member_phone_number = #{memberPhoneNumber}, m.member_address = #{memberAddress}, m.member_address_detail = #{memberAddressDetail}, m.member_zone_code = #{memberZoneCode} where m.member_number = #{memberNumber}
